text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day after the tryouts, I'm about<n>to head home when I
spot a<n>frantic—and familiar—student.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ah! You're the trainer from<n>yesterday, right?!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I haven't been able to find Ryan since<n>classes ended...

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
She's always training, so I figured<n>I'd find her on the
course or in the<n>gym...

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
But she wasn't there! And after that<n>weird race yesterday,
I'm starting to<n>get worried.
choice_data_list: Got it. I'll help you look.
Got it. I'll help you look.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Really?! Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ines Fujin and I take a quick moment<n>to decide where we
should each look,<n>and then we split up to search for<n>
Mejiro Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After checking the school grounds, I<n>head to the nearby
river, parks,<n>shopping district, and even the<n>station. Just
when all hope seems<n>lost...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh? What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I tell Mejiro Ryan about Ines Fujin's<n>search for her and
how I offered to<n>help.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Gotcha... Aw, man, sorry about that.<n>I'd better apologize to
Ines when I get<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I just really wanted to run outside<n>today. I was planning to
be back<n>before anyone started worrying, but I<n>guess that
was a bust...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I stopped here to take a break, but<n>then I got caught up in
the scenery...<n>Brings back a lot of memories.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Yeah... You see, there's a steep hillclose to the Mejiro family home. Likesteep steep. But if you make it to the top, you get an incredible view.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
When I was young, we used to play<n>on that hill all the time.
We Mejiro kids<n>would race up it to see who would be<n>the
first to see that breathtaking view.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: That includes McQueen too, of course.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: She's always been a fast one.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... Out of our whole family, she's<n>probably the one I'm
closest to. I<n>guess we're like childhood friends...<n>Or maybe
sisters?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But... McQueen's always been the<n>model Mejiro, and I've
been, well...<n>me. So even though I'm technically<n>older, I
never really could act like a big<n>sister to her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: She's just... always been amazing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: She knows what it means to be aMejiro, and what sort of standardshe's gotta set, both on and off therace course. And then she meetsthose standards.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Her manners are top-notch, and she<n>always looks so
elegant. She's<n>everything the fans of our family<n>want...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I really respect her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: She's completely different from me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, thanks... You're a good<n>person.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But you don't need to lie. I know I<n>could never be like
McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I don't run with the Mejiro name in<n>mind, and I don't think I
ever will.<n>Even if I could, I wouldn't be able to<n>compete
with her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: After all, I just like running. Nothing<n>more... nothing less.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
No one would ever look at me and<n>think of me as a
distinguished<n>daughter of a noble lineage. Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She laughs it off, but I can tell that her<n>problems are eating
her up inside. If<n>only I could do something...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her dedication to working out has<n>forged her body into a
powerhouse.<n>She's clearly got more talent than<n>she
thinks.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In any case... it's clear that she's<n>insecure about her
motivation, and it's<n>been hindering her performance.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I try to puzzle out a solution to this<n>conundrum, I head
back to school.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wow, so you're doing the 3,200<n>meter turf race, huh? What
should I<n>do... Oh, maybe the 5,000 meter<n>freestyle race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There is no such race in the Tracen<n>Meet!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I quickly remember that the Tracen<n>Meet, an event where
students can<n>run in a category of their choosing,<n>will
happen soon.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Why do you always gotta do the long<n>runs, huh? Why not
do the 1,200<n>meter and make the competition eat<n>your
dust?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My goal is to win the Tenno Sho, so I<n>obviously need to
prepare for that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The Tracen Meet attracts all sorts of<n>fans, so I must run in a
way that does<n>not besmirch the Mejiro name!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It sounds like Mejiro McQueen is<n>aiming to win the 3,200
meter turf<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan's problem seems<n>deeply linked to McQueen.
Perhaps<n>this could be a solution.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh? You think I should enter the<n>same race as McQueen?
choice_data_list:
Obviously I can't force you, but think about it,
okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Well... It's not that I'm opposed...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: How long has it been since she and I<n>ran together anyway?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: And why'd you decide to tell me this<n>now?
choice_data_list:
I thought you might learn something from this
race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Really?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ...All right. No promises, but I'll give it<n>some thought.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days later, I decide to check on<n>Mejiro Ryan. I don't
see her at the<n>track or in classes, so I decide to<n>check the
gym.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Phew... All done... Nah, let's doone more set.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's you again!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Uh... I guess so, yeah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Hey... I, uh... I did it. I signed up for the<n>same race as
McQueen. The 3,200<n>meter turf race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I'll be honest, though... I don't really<n>get why I decided to do
it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I'm training more than usual, but I<n>think I'm just feeling a
little antsy. Not<n>much more to it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But... I'm still determined to do it. Feel<n>free to come check
out the race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that, Mejiro Ryan returns to her<n>workout, pumping out
rep after rep.
